meanings.sent1: Lack of job opportunities is impoverishing many families in the community.
meanings.sent2: The economic crisis is slowly impoverishing the entire nation.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick of pulling endless scarves from a hat ended up impoverishing him of fabric.
meanings.sent4: The constant flooding was like a relentless thief, impoverishing the land of its richness.
meanings.sent5: The greedy king's heavy taxes were impoverishing his subjects beyond measure.

meanings.sent1: Using cheap materials is impoverishing the overall quality of the product.
meanings.sent2: The lack of maintenance is slowly impoverishing the historic building.
meanings.sent3: The overuse of filters on the photo made the image look strangely impoverishing.
meanings.sent4: The constant exposure to sunlight was like a harsh critic, impoverishing the colors of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The constant wear and tear were impoverishing the durability of the furniture piece.
